Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin F G6K analog (Synthetic AMPs, Leu-rich, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) totemporin FL: 31%, I=K: 15%.Activity: active against E. coli B21 (MIC 4 uM), E. cloacae beta12 (MIC 16 uM), P. aeruginosa PA14 (MIC 32 uM), and S. epidermidis ATCC12228 (MIC 2 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in SDS or TFE.Peptide stability:  it can be cleaved by proteases in 25% fetal bovine serum  in 6 h (FBS), slower than other analogs in this series.
Literature Information.Author: Bosquetti LM, Oliveira CS, Cerchiaro G, Oliveira Junior VX. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Synthesis and characterization of new antimicrobial peptides derived from Temporin F.
